code: import axios from'axios';import ENV from'./../config/base-env';export const getList=(params,token)=>{const queryString=new URLSearchParams(params).toString();return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/users?").concat(queryString),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const create=(params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('name',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.name);formData.set('email',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.email);formData.set('phone',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.phone);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/user"),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const detail=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/user/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const active=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/user/active/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const inactive=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/user/inactive/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const disable=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/user/disable/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const resetPassword=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/user/reset-password/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const remove=(id,token)=>{return axios.delete("".concat(ENV.API,"/user/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};
